message.enable: Do you really want to synchronize your TOTPs ? They will be available on all your synced devices.
message.disable: Do you really want to stop synchronizing your TOTPs ? Any change made on this instance of the app will not be reflected anymore on the other linked devices.

deletedTotpPolicyPickerDialog.title: Migrate TOTPs
deletedTotpPolicyPickerDialog.message: Some TOTPs have been deleted on this device, but not on the remote storage. What do you want to do with them ?

delete.title: Delete them
delete.subtitle: Delete the conflicting TOTPs. This cannot be undone.

restore.title: Keep them
restore.subtitle: Undo the deletion, and keep all TOTPs.
